TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: Sennetti, can I ask how the construction of your <color=orange>Translation Lab</color> is coming along?

SENNETTI: Progress is slow but steady. I must confess, the small size of the entrance is making it quite difficult to transport the necessary material. The distance that the material must be hauled is also impeding my progress. The journey from this quarry to the construction site is not a short one.
NESIA: Have you not been using the larger entrance?
SENNETTI: There is a larger entrance?
NESIA: Yes, there is a much larger entrance. It would make transporting your material much easier, especially since it is relatively close to <color=orange>Graviton’s Folly</color>.

SENNETTI: I will be sure to start using that entrance then! Thank you for the information! I’ll make one more trip along the usual path and leave a short-lived beacon at the construction site, to make it easier to find the larger entrance you speak of.
AZOLLA: I imagine that the locals will also be much happier without us hauling all of our material through their home.
